code: import React from'react';import{CheckCircle,AlertCircle,BarChart}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const QualityMetrics=()=>{const metrics=[{label:'Pass Rate',value:99.8,target:99.5,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CheckCircle,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-green-500"})},{label:'Defect Rate',value:0.2,target:0.5,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AlertCircle,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-red-500"})},{label:'First Pass Yield',value:98.5,target:98.0,icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BarChart,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-blue-500"})}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white rounded-lg shadow p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold mb-6",children:"Quality Metrics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",children:metrics.map((metric,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center p-4 bg-gray-50 rounded-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center space-x-2 mb-2",children:[metric.icon,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-600",children:metric.label})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-1",children:[metric.value,"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500",children:["Target: ",metric.target,"%"]})]},index))})]});};export default QualityMetrics;export{QualityMetrics};
